CustomField.description: +++ INTEGRATION: MASTER DATA +++ Do not change this field without reviewing impact with master data integration" . Unique customer number shared across numerous Maersk systems. Populated by custom Java components in the middleware layer. Should be read-only to users using FLS so there is no chance of modification by anyone other than the Master Data Interface User. #RQ-002042-Reduced the text characters to 11 #RQ-004927.
CustomField.label: SCV Code
